member.name: T:EasyToolKit.Core.AnimationCurveExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for Unity's AnimationCurve class to simplify working with arbitrary time and value ranges.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.AnimationCurveExtensions.EvaluateWithRemap(UnityEngine.AnimationCurve,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Evaluates the animation curve by remapping the input time from [0, maxTime] to [0, 1] range. This allows using the curve with arbitrary time ranges while maintaining the curve's original behavior.
member.param: The current time value in the [0, maxTime] range
The maximum time value that defines the input range
member.returns: The evaluated curve value at the remapped time position

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.AnimationCurveExtensions.EvaluateWithRemap(UnityEngine.AnimationCurve,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Evaluates the animation curve with double remapping: first remaps input time from [0, maxTime] to [0, 1], then remaps the curve output from [0, 1] to [minValue, maxValue]. This allows using the curve with arbitrary time and value ranges.
member.param: The current time value in the [0, maxTime] range
The maximum time value that defines the input range
The minimum output value for the remapped result
The maximum output value for the remapped result
member.returns: The evaluated curve value remapped to the [minValue, maxValue] range
member.remarks: Note: The AnimationCurve.Evaluate result must be in the [0, 1] range for proper remapping.

member.name: T:EasyToolKit.Core.AnimatorExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for Unity's Animator component to simplify parameter validation and management.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.AnimatorExtensions.HasParam(UnityEngine.Animator,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the Animator has a parameter with the specified name. This is useful for safely setting parameters without causing runtime errors.
member.param: The name of the parameter to check for
member.returns: True if the Animator has a parameter with the specified name, false otherwise

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.AnimatorExtensions.HasParam(UnityEngine.Animator,System.String,UnityEngine.AnimatorControllerParameterType)
member.summary: Checks if the Animator has a parameter with the specified name and type. This provides type-safe parameter validation for Animator operations.
member.param: The name of the parameter to check for
The expected parameter type (Float, Int, Bool, or Trigger)
member.returns: True if the Animator has a parameter with the specified name and type, false otherwise

member.name: T:EasyToolKit.Core.AppDomainExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for AppDomain to filter and retrieve specific assembly types commonly used in Unity development environments.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.AppDomainExtensions.GetProjectAssemblies(System.AppDomain)
member.summary: Retrieves all assemblies that belong to the current Unity project. These assemblies typically start with "Assembly." prefix.
member.returns: An enumerable collection of project assemblies

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.AppDomainExtensions.GetUnityEngineAssemblies(System.AppDomain)
member.summary: Retrieves all assemblies that belong to the Unity Engine runtime. These assemblies typically start with "UnityEngine." prefix.
member.returns: An enumerable collection of Unity Engine assemblies

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.AppDomainExtensions.GetUnityEditorAssemblies(System.AppDomain)
member.summary: Retrieves all assemblies that belong to the Unity Editor. These assemblies typically start with "UnityEditor." prefix. Note: These assemblies are only available in the Unity Editor environment.
member.returns: An enumerable collection of Unity Editor assemblies

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.AppDomainExtensions.GetUnityAssemblies(System.AppDomain)
member.summary: Retrieves all assemblies that belong to the Unity framework. These assemblies typically start with "Unity." prefix.
member.returns: An enumerable collection of Unity framework assemblies

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.AppDomainExtensions.GetSystemAssemblies(System.AppDomain)
member.summary: Retrieves all assemblies that belong to the .NET System framework. These assemblies typically start with "System." prefix.
member.returns: An enumerable collection of System framework assemblies

member.name: T:EasyToolKit.Core.AudioExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for AudioSource to enhance audio playback functionality in Unity applications.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.AudioExtensions.PlayWithChildren(UnityEngine.AudioSource)
member.summary: Plays the audio source and all AudioSource components found in its children. This is useful for playing hierarchical audio setups where multiple audio sources are organized under a parent object.

example.code: // Plays the parent audio source and all child audio sources audioSource.PlayWithChildren();

member.name: T:EasyToolKit.Core.CollectionExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for collections and enumerables to enhance functionality with common operations like validation, transformation, and iteration.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.CollectionExtensions.IsAllSame``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Determines whether all elements in the sequence are equal using the default equality comparer.
member.typeparam: The type of elements in the sequence
member.returns: true if all elements are equal; otherwise, false

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.CollectionExtensions.IsAllSame``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Func{``0,``0,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Determines whether all elements in the sequence are equal using a custom comparison function.
member.typeparam: The type of elements in the sequence
member.returns: true if all elements are equal according to the comparison function; otherwise, false
member.exception: Thrown when enumerator is null

member.param: The action to perform on each element

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.CollectionExtensions.HasDuplicate``2(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Func{``0,``1})
member.summary: Determines whether the sequence contains any duplicate elements based on a selector function.

The type of the selected value to check for duplicates
member.param: The function to select the value to check for duplicates
member.returns: true if any duplicate elements are found; otherwise, false

member.summary: Determines whether the sequence contains any duplicate elements using the default equality comparer.

member.returns: true if any duplicate elements are found; otherwise, false

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.CollectionExtensions.IsNullOrEmpty``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Determines whether the sequence is null or contains no elements.

member.returns: true if the sequence is null or empty; otherwise, false

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.CollectionExtensions.IsNotNullOrEmpty``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Determines whether the sequence is not null and contains at least one element.
member.typeparam: The type of elements in the sequence
member.returns: true if the sequence is not null and contains elements; otherwise, false

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.CollectionExtensions.To2dArray``1(System.Collections.Generic.IList{``0},System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts a one-dimensional list to a two-dimensional array with specified dimensions.
member.typeparam: The type of elements in the list
member.param: The number of rows in the resulting 2D array
The number of columns in the resulting 2D array
member.returns: A two-dimensional array with the specified dimensions

member.summary: Converts a one-dimensional list to a jagged array with specified dimensions.

The number of columns in the resulting jagged array
member.returns: A jagged array with the specified dimensions

member.summary: Creates a new array with the element at the specified index removed.

member.param: The target length of the list

member.name: T:EasyToolKit.Core.ColorExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for Unity's Color struct to enable fluent API operations for color manipulation and modification.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.ColorExtensions.SetR(UnityEngine.Color,System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the red component of the color and returns the modified color for fluent chaining.
member.returns: The modified color with updated red component

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.ColorExtensions.SetG(UnityEngine.Color,System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the green component of the color and returns the modified color for fluent chaining.
member.returns: The modified color with updated green component

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.ColorExtensions.SetB(UnityEngine.Color,System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the blue component of the color and returns the modified color for fluent chaining.
member.returns: The modified color with updated blue component

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.ColorExtensions.SetA(UnityEngine.Color,System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the alpha component of the color and returns the modified color for fluent chaining.
member.returns: The modified color with updated alpha component

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.ColorExtensions.MulR(UnityEngine.Color,System.Single)
member.summary: Multiplies the red component by the specified ratio and returns the modified color for fluent chaining.
member.returns: The modified color with red component multiplied

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.ColorExtensions.MulG(UnityEngine.Color,System.Single)
member.summary: Multiplies the green component by the specified ratio and returns the modified color for fluent chaining.
member.returns: The modified color with green component multiplied

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.ColorExtensions.MulB(UnityEngine.Color,System.Single)
member.summary: Multiplies the blue component by the specified ratio and returns the modified color for fluent chaining.
member.returns: The modified color with blue component multiplied

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.ColorExtensions.MulA(UnityEngine.Color,System.Single)
member.summary: Multiplies the alpha component by the specified ratio and returns the modified color for fluent chaining.
member.returns: The modified color with alpha component multiplied

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.ColorExtensions.MulRGB(UnityEngine.Color,System.Single)
member.summary: Multiplies the RGB components (red, green, blue) by the specified ratio and returns the modified color for fluent chaining. The alpha component remains unchanged.
member.param: The multiplication ratio for RGB components
member.returns: The modified color with RGB components multiplied

member.name: T:EasyToolKit.Core.GameObjectExtensions

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.TypeExtensions.ResolveMissingGenericTypeArguments(System.Type,System.Type,System.Boolean)

summary.para: 根据源类型（可能包含泛型参数）和目标类型，从目标类型中提取出原类型缺失的泛型参数类型。
如果源类型是个泛型参数，则直接返回目标类型。

member.param: 是否允许通过继承关系匹配泛型定义。

member.name: T:EasyToolKit.Core.EasyEventHandler`1
member.summary: 事件处理器

member.name: T:EasyToolKit.Core.EventTriggerWrapper

summary.para: 事件处理器的触发行为扩展
可以使用该委托实现例如：确保在UI线程调用事件处理器

member.param: 事件处理器的触发调用对象

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.EasyEventManager.Register``1(System.Object,EasyToolKit.Core.EasyEventHandler{``0})
member.summary: 注册事件处理器

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.EasyEventManager.UnregisterSubscriber(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: 取消注册target中所有事件处理器
member.param: 包含基类的事件处理器

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.EasyEventManager.Unregister``1(System.Object,EasyToolKit.Core.EasyEventHandler{``0})
member.summary: 取消注册事件处理器

summary.para: 触发事件
注意：在事件处理器中触发事件要谨慎，处理不当可能会死锁
如果出现死锁了，检查以下情况
1、是否事件处理器中再次触发处理的事件（包括整个触发栈）
确保会在Unity线程触发

summary.para: 提供对池化游戏对象的生命周期属性（激活/空闲时长、当前计时器）的访问接口。
主要用于内部机制获取或设置如下属性：
- 激活状态下的最大存活时间（超时将回收）
- 空闲状态下的最大存活时间（超时将销毁）
- 当前计时器（根据状态不同表示距离回收或销毁的时间）

member.name: P:EasyToolKit.Core.IPooledGameObjectLifetimeAccessor.ActiveLifetime
member.summary: 激活中对象的回收时间，小于0则无限制

member.name: P:EasyToolKit.Core.IPooledGameObjectLifetimeAccessor.IdleLifetime
member.summary: 空闲中对象的销毁时间，小于0则无限制

summary.para: 获取当前计时器累计时间（单位：秒）。
- 激活状态时：表示已激活时长
- 空闲状态时：表示已空闲时长

member.param: 存活时间（秒），小于0表示无限制。
member.returns: 配置后的访问器实例，支持链式调用。

member.summary: 设置空闲状态下的最大存活时间。
member.param: 存活时间（秒），小于0表示无限制。
member.returns: 配置后的访问器实例，支持链式调用。

member.summary: 设置当前计时器累计时间。
member.returns: 配置后的访问器实例，支持链式调用。

member.name: T:EasyToolKit.Core.IPoolItem
member.summary:
对象元素接口。
若该接口由普通类实现，则在对象被取出/回收时会直接调用该实例的方法。
若由 Unity 组件实现，则在对象池操作时，会调用该 GameObject 上所有实现该接口的组件。
该接口为可选实现，仅在需要监听池事件时实现。

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.IPoolItem.Rent(EasyToolKit.Core.IObjectPool)
member.summary: 对象从对象池中被取出时调用。

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.IPoolItem.Release(EasyToolKit.Core.IObjectPool)
member.summary: 对象被回收到对象池中时调用。

summary.para: 对象池的容量上限。设置小于0表示无限制
当设置新的容量时，如果新容量小于当前活跃对象数量，将抛出异常。

member.name: T:EasyToolKit.Core.DefaultTypeMatchRules
member.summary: Provides default type matching rules for the TypeMatcher system. These rules handle common type matching scenarios including exact matches, generic type matching, type inference, and nested type matching.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.DefaultTypeMatchRules.ExactMatch(EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatchIndex,System.Type[],System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Matches types exactly - both the type and all target types must match exactly.
member.param: The type match index to evaluate.
The target types to match against.
When set to true, stops further rule evaluation for this match index.
member.returns: The matched type if successful; otherwise, null.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.DefaultTypeMatchRules.GenericSingleTargetMatch(EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatchIndex,System.Type[],System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Matches generic type definitions against single generic target types. The target type must have the same generic type definition as the match index target.
member.param: The type match index to evaluate.
The target types to match against.
When set to true, stops further rule evaluation for this match index.
member.returns: The constructed generic type if successful; otherwise, null.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.DefaultTypeMatchRules.TargetsSatisfyGenericParameterConstraints(EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatchIndex,System.Type[],System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Matches when all target types are generic parameters and satisfy the generic constraints of the match index type.
member.param: The type match index to evaluate.
The target types to match against.
When set to true, stops further rule evaluation for this match index.
member.returns: The constructed generic type if successful; otherwise, null.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.DefaultTypeMatchRules.GenericParameterInference(EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatchIndex,System.Type[],System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Performs generic parameter inference to match types. Infers generic parameters from the target types and constructs the appropriate generic type.
member.param: The type match index to evaluate.
The target types to match against.
When set to true, stops further rule evaluation for this match index.
member.returns: The inferred generic type if successful; otherwise, null.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.DefaultTypeMatchRules.NestedInSameGenericType(EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatchIndex,System.Type[],System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Matches nested types that are declared within the same generic type definition. The declaring types must have the same generic type definition.
member.param: The type match index to evaluate.
The target types to match against.
When set to true, stops further rule evaluation for this match index.
member.returns: The constructed generic type if successful; otherwise, null.

member.name: T:EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatchIndex
member.summary: Represents a type matching index that defines a type and its target types for matching.

member.name: P:EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatchIndex.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the type to be matched.

member.name: P:EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatchIndex.Priority
member.summary: Gets or sets the priority of this match index (higher values have higher priority).

member.name: P:EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatchIndex.Targets
member.summary: Gets or sets the target types that this index should match against.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatchIndex.#ctor(System.Type,System.Int32,System.Type[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the TypeMatchIndex class.
member.param: The priority of this match index.
The target types to match against.

member.name: T:EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatchResult
member.summary: Represents the result of a type matching operation.

member.name: P:EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatchResult.MatchIndex
member.summary: Gets the match index that was used for this match.

member.name: P:EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatchResult.MatchedType
member.summary: Gets the actual type that was matched.

member.name: P:EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatchResult.MatchTargets
member.summary: Gets the target types that were matched against.

member.name: P:EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatchResult.MatchRule
member.summary: Gets the match rule that produced this result.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatchResult.#ctor(EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatchIndex,System.Type,System.Type[],EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatchRule)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the TypeMatchResult class.
member.param: The match index that was used.
The actual type that was matched.
The target types that were matched against.
The match rule that produced this result.

member.name: T:EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatchRule
member.summary: Represents a method that determines if a type match index matches against target types.
member.param: The type match index to evaluate.
The target types to match against.
When set to true by the rule, stops further rule evaluation for this match index.
member.returns: The matched type if successful; otherwise, null.

member.name: T:EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatcher
member.summary: Provides a flexible type matching system that can match types against target types using configurable rules. Supports exact matching, generic type matching, type inference, and custom matching rules.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatcher.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the TypeMatcher class.
member.param: Whether to add the default type matching rules.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatcher.AddTypeMatchIndices(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatchIndex})
member.summary: Adds type match indices to the current collection.
member.param: The type match indices to add.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatcher.SetTypeMatchIndices(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatchIndex})
member.summary: Replaces the current type match indices with the specified collection.
member.param: The new type match indices to use.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatcher.AddMatchRule(EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatchRule)
member.summary: Adds a custom match rule to the type matcher.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatcher.RemoveMatchRule(EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatchRule)
member.summary: Removes a match rule from the type matcher.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatcher.GetCachedMatches(System.Type[])
member.summary: Gets cached type matches for the specified target types. Results are cached based on the target types to improve performance.
member.param: The target types to match against.
member.returns: An array of type match results, ordered by priority (highest first).

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatcher.GetCachedMergedResults(System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList{EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatchResult[]})
member.summary: Gets cached merged results from multiple type match result arrays. Results are merged and cached based on the input arrays to improve performance.
member.param: The list of type match result arrays to merge.
member.returns: A merged array of type match results, ordered by priority (highest first).

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.TypeMatcher.AddDefaultMatchRules
member.summary: Adds the default type matching rules to the matcher. These include exact matching, generic type matching, type inference, and nested type matching.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.MathUtility.Remap(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: 将一个在[A, B]区间的x, 映射到[C, D]区间

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.MathUtility.GetVerticesOfRotatedRectangle(UnityEngine.Rect,System.Single)
member.summary: 获取旋转后矩形的四个顶点
member.returns: [左下角, 左上角, 右上角, 右下角]

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.MathUtility.GetVerticesOfRotatedRectangle(UnityEngine.Vector2,UnityEngine.Vector2,System.Single)
member.summary: 获取旋转后矩形的四个顶点
member.returns: [左下角, 左上角, 右上角, 右下角]

member.name: T:EasyToolKit.Core.ReflectionUtility
member.summary: Provides utility methods for runtime reflection operations, including creating value getters for accessing members through deep reflection paths.

remarks.para: This utility enables dynamic access to object members using string-based paths that can include fields, properties, methods, and collection/array elements. Supports both static and instance member access with type safety validation.

Path syntax examples:
Field access: "MyField"
Property access: "MyProperty"
Method call: "GetValue()"
Array element: "MyArray[0]"
List element: "MyList[1]"
Nested access: "MyField.NestedProperty[2].GetValue()"

member.name: T:EasyToolKit.Core.ReflectionUtility.PathStepType
member.summary: Represents the type of step in a reflection path.

member.name: F:EasyToolKit.Core.ReflectionUtility.PathStepType.Member
member.summary: A field, property, or method member access.

member.name: F:EasyToolKit.Core.ReflectionUtility.PathStepType.WeakListElement
member.summary: An element access in a non-generic IList collection.

member.name: F:EasyToolKit.Core.ReflectionUtility.PathStepType.StrongListElement
member.summary: An element access in a generic IList<T> collection.

member.name: F:EasyToolKit.Core.ReflectionUtility.PathStepType.ArrayElement
member.summary: An element access in an array.

member.name: T:EasyToolKit.Core.ReflectionUtility.PathStep
member.summary: Represents a single step in a reflection path, containing information about how to access the next value in the path traversal.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.ReflectionUtility.PathStep.#ctor(System.Reflection.MemberInfo)
member.summary: Creates a member access path step.
member.param: The field, property, or method to access.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.ReflectionUtility.PathStep.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a weak list element access path step (non-generic IList).
member.param: The index of the element to access.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.ReflectionUtility.PathStep.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Type,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a strong list or array element access path step.
member.param: The index of the element to access.
The element type of the list or array.
True if this is an array access, false for generic list access.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.ReflectionUtility.CreateStaticValueGetter(System.Type,System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a delegate that gets a value from a static member path.
member.param: The expected type of the result, or null to infer from the path.
The type containing the static member path root.
member.returns: A delegate that returns the value at the specified static path.
member.exception: Thrown when the path root is not static or the path is invalid.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Core.ReflectionUtility.CreateInstanceValueGetter(System.Type,System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a delegate that gets a value from an instance member path.
member.param: The type of the instance to get the value from.
The expected type of the result, or null to infer from the path.
member.returns: A delegate that takes an instance and returns the value at the specified path.
member.exception: Thrown when the path root is static or the path is invalid.
